name: doe-data-main
description: code/ : contains all the code part data/ : data part           data/csv_files: contains 3 files for concatenated vulink, at500 and at200 sensors

scripts.name: my-doe-main
scripts.start: npm run start:backend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm install && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start npm --name backend -- run dev
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && NODE_ENV=production pm2 start npm --name frontend -- start
